title: 大虾好，我用的是mac版本，但是加载了sp启动器后出现以下内容
author: 湖畔的妖精
txt_content:
大虾你好，我用的是mac版本，但是加载了sp启动器后出现以下内容




      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game

A full error report has been saved to /Users/VictorZhang/Library/Application Support/minecraft/crash-reports/crash-2013-05-31_14.24.09-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT d29f1370 --------
Full report at:
/Users/VictorZhang/Library/Application Support/minecraft/crash-reports/crash-2013-05-31_14.24.09-client.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!

Generated 13-5-31 下午2:24

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.5.2
        Operating System: Mac OS X (x86_64) version 10.7.5
        Java Version: 1.7.0_21, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation

        LWJGL: 2.4.2

        Is Modded: Probably not. Jar signature remains and client brand is untouched.
        Type: Client (map_client.txt)
        Texture Pack: Default
        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
        Vec3 Pool Size: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null[failed to get system properties (java.lang.NullPointerException)]


org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Could not get the JAWT interface
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.AWTSurfaceLock.lockAndInitHandle(Native Method)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.AWTSurfaceLock.access$100(AWTSurfaceLock.java:49)

        at org.lwjgl.opengl.AWTSurfaceLock.lockAndGetHandle(AWTSurfaceLock.java:64)

        at org.lwjgl.opengl.MacOSXDisplayPeerInfo.doLockAndInitHandle(MacOSXDisplayPeerInfo.java:56)

求助！
